translations.form--hermes-checkout--payment.payment-l:
For orders over 50,000 Yuan, to ensure your payment is successful, we recommend you to use online banking on your computer.
For more information, please contact Hermès Customer Service: {{url_phone}}
translations.form-hermes-checkout-address-description: Building number, Street name, Apartment/ Villa number
translations.hermes-checkout-page.out-of-stock-angula: Oops! Your payment was not successful because one of the items in your order is no longer available. Please {{cart_link}} for more information.
translations.hermes-checkout-payment-global-error: Oops, something&s;s gone wrong. Please try again later.
translations.hermes-footer-cgu-label: General Terms and Conditions of Use
translations.hermes-footer-cgv-label: General Terms and Conditions of Sale
translations.hermes-global-translations.error-during-: Please check your payment information and try again.
translations.hermes-global-translations.meta.descript: {{facetCategoryName}} • Discover our collection : {{facetCategoryName}} - {{masterCategory}} - {{category}} on the official Hermès online store !
translations.hermes-global-translations.the-credit-ca: The security code is invalid. Please enter 3 or 4 digits according to your card.
translations.hermes-global-translations.this-card-typ: This is not a valid credit card number.
translations.hermes-global-translations.your-account-: {{prefix}} {{firstname}} {{lastname}} welcome to Hermes.com! We can confirm your account has been created successfully!
translations.hermes.checkout.card.date-expiration: The date is not valid, please verify the date written on your credit card.
translations.hermes.header_footer.cookie_banner.text: By continuing to browse this site, you are agreeing to the use of cookies for statistical and advertising purposes, as well as to facilitate information sharing on social networks. To find out more and change your cookie settings, !link.
translations.hermes.personalization.save.privacy-poli: Your mail address will be used by Hermès to send you a link to your personalized product to change it at anytime. By clicking on &a;quot;Send&a;quot;, you consent to the processing of your data in accordance with the Privacy Policy of Hermès. To learn more about the processing of your personal data and your rights, please consult the {{privacyPolicyUrl}}.
translations.hermes.product-locator.concessionary.dis: Product availability is not provided for the following stores: Hermes Chagrin Falls at Cuffs, Hermès Manhasset. Please {{ franchiseStoreLink }} directly for more information.
translations.hermes.product_locator.find-in-store-err: The product is currently unavailable in store. Contact your closest store for further information.
translations.hermes_account.terms-and-conditions-use-: General Terms and Conditions of Use
translations.hermes_account.wechat_binding.click_info: By clicking on the “Confirm” button, you agree to accept the !generalTerms and that your data will be processed in compliance with the !privacyLink of Hermès.
translations.hermes_checkout_payment.checkbox-GTC: I accept the !gtcs and consent to the processing of my data, in accordance with Hermes&s; !privacyLink.
translations.hermes_checkout_payment.i-agree-to-the-f: I have read and accept the !generalTerms of the Hermes.com website, as well as the !privacyLink.
translations.hermes_footer.newsletter.subscribe.legal: By creating an account, you agree to accept the !generalTerms and that your data will be processed in compliance with the !privacyLink of Hermès.

By subscribing to our newsletter, you agree to receive information by email concerning offers, services, products or events from Hermès of Paris, Inc. and the other companies of the Hermès Group in accordance with the !privacyLink.
You can unsubscribe at any time via your online account or the “Unsubscribe” link at the bottom of each of our email marketing communications.
translations.hermes_global.i-agree-receiving-informat: By checking this box, you agree to receive information by email about offers, services, products and events from Hermès Sellier, as well as from other companies in the Hermès group, in accordance with our !privacyLink. You can unsubscribe at any time on your online space or by clicking on the &a;quot;Unsubscribe&a;quot; link at the bottom of all our e-mail communications.
translations.hermes_livechat.away_message: Thank you for contacting us via Hermès.com Live Chat! It seems you may have stepped away or are no longer in need of our assistance, so we will end this conversation for your convenience. Please don’t hesitate to chat with us again if we can be of help. Merci beaucoup, au revoir!
translations.hermes_livechat.disconnect_message: Thank you for contacting Hermès.com and we look forward to your next visit! Merci beaucoup, au revoir!
translations.hermes_livechat.privacy_policy_text: By using our Live Chat, you accept the use of your personal data by Hermès of Paris in order to respond to your requests about a product or service and to enhance the customer experience. To find out more about the management of your personal data and your rights, please see our !privacyLink.

menuEntryList.name: Ties, bow ties and pocket squares

body.title: Women&s;s Bags and Clutches

alt_paths.zh-Hans-cn: /cn/zh/category/女士/箱包小皮具/箱包晚宴包/

body.description: Looking for women bags and clutches, take a dive into the latest Hermès collections of leather handbags, shoulderbags or crossbody bags made with Hermès knowhow
body.seo_text_on_grid:
&l;div&g;Hermès&s; women&s;s handbags and clutches combine leather craftsmanship with luxurious&a;nbsp;materials to create elegant shapes, unique lines, and versatile styles.&a;nbsp;&l;/div&g;

&l;div&g;Find your new travel companion with Hermès&s; collection of clutches, &l;a href="category/women/bags-and-small-leather-goods/bags-and-clutches/?facet_category=sacs_a_dos#|"&g;backpacks&l;/a&g;, &l;a href="category/women/bags-and-small-leather-goods/bags-and-clutches/?facet_category=sacs_porte_epaule#|"&g;shoulder bags&l;/a&g;, tote bags and &l;a href="category/women/bags-and-small-leather-goods/bags-and-clutches/?facet_category=sacs_porte_main#|"&g;handbags&l;/a&g;.&l;/div&g;

editorials.contentBody:
&l;p class="editorial-block-text"&g;Leather goods spill their secrets! Dive into the heart of an exceptional craftsmanship where expertise and invention go hand in hand&l;/p&g;

&l;div class="grid-cta-button"&g;&l;a href="story/310339-hermes-iconic-bag-lines"&g;Discover the collection&l;/a&g;&l;/div&g;
